Sentencas: Low-temperature-sintered MnCo2O4-MnO2 coatings have been prepared on pre-oxidized SUS430 ferritic alloy by slurry coating.
Titulo: Effect of pre-oxidation on the oxidation resistance of spinel-coated Fe-Cr ferritic alloy for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: The effect of pre-oxidation treatment before slurry coating is then investigated.
Titulo: Effect of pre-oxidation on the oxidation resistance of spinel-coated Fe-Cr ferritic alloy for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Microstructural and electrical characterizations show that 25 h of pre-oxidation at 800 degrees C could significantly improve the oxidation resistance of the coated alloy and effectively inhibit the increase in area-specific electrical resistance during long-term oxidation.
Titulo: Effect of pre-oxidation on the oxidation resistance of spinel-coated Fe-Cr ferritic alloy for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: These effects can be explained by the interfacial reactions between the coating and the pre-oxidized alloy during sintering and oxidation tests.
Titulo: Effect of pre-oxidation on the oxidation resistance of spinel-coated Fe-Cr ferritic alloy for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Furthermore, this study suggests that the dense reaction layer at the coating-alloy interface could be the key to improving the oxidation resistance of metallic interconnects with low-temperature-sintered spinel coatings.
Titulo: Effect of pre-oxidation on the oxidation resistance of spinel-coated Fe-Cr ferritic alloy for solid oxide fuel cell applications
Effect of pre-oxidation on the oxidation resistance of spinel-coated Fe-Cr ferritic alloy for solid oxide fuel cell applications
Effect of pre-oxidation on the oxidation resistance of spinel-coated Fe-Cr ferritic alloy for solid oxide fuel cell applications
